creator: andrew.doddington@jpmorgan.com
text:
The ant run script allows global java runtime options to be supplied, using the 
environment variable ANT_OPTS. Could a similar facility be added to allow 
options to be passed to ant itself - i.e. placed after the ant main class in the 
run command. This would allow us e.g. to compensate for new command-line 
switches in new versions of ant when switching between versions.

Although the '-find' option was the main drver for this request,m it seems to be 
a generally useful facility, which ought to be extremely easy to add.

Note: The Solaris release process allows environment variables to be set as part 
of the standard Load/Unload process.

creator: holtdl@yahoo.com
text:
Already done in CVS; will be available in the next release (or you can pick up 
the scripts to use now). The env var is ANT_ARGS.
